title: Mutiny and the Reactiverse
content: I had the question multiple times: how do I use Eclipse Vert.x in Quarkus? Indeed, you can use Vert.x in Quarkus. You can deploy verticles, communicate with the event bus, or use anything from the Vert.x ecosystem. But, you can also use the Mutiny variant of Vert.x in Quarkus, and...
